Parameters.Name: pAttribute
Parameters.Prompt: Attribute to use to create hierarchy

Parameters.Name: pAllowNew
Parameters.Prompt: Boolean: 1 = True allow new consols to be inserted

Parameters.Name: pUnwind
Parameters.Prompt: Boolean: 1 = True unwind current hierarchy before creating from attribute

Parameters.Name: pRecursive
Parameters.Prompt: Boolean: 1 = True break all relationships not just immediate children
